room_title: Escape room "Vodou" by Hundred Acres Manor in Pittsburgh
room_address: 1 Hundred Acres Drive Bethel Park, PA 15102
room_description: Take a tour through the deep south where the spirits of the bayou beckon you. The Stitchers want your bodies, The Priestess wants your souls and the bodies of the damned look upon you. Do your best to keep your skin in tact as you run from man and beast alike through the Louisiana swamps.
